title: Anime 80s - An E-commerce store
description: Designed a sleek and intuitive interface for creation of Print on Demand T-shirts and for users to browse art pieces and purchase them securely online.

title: Route ED - Your Roadmap to Success
description: An Educational Platform that provides personalized career roadmaps and offers AI oriented Career counselling, with the help of EDAcad-GPT.

title: Testify ADHD - Platform to check your ADHD Score
description: A platform where you can answer few questions regarding traits and symptoms of ADHD and get a score which will tell you about severity of your condition.
